column1: 1,Complete Order for iPhone 15 with Customization Options,"Navigate to the homepage, select an iPhone 15 with specific options, fill out the shipping address, and complete the order.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on link iPhone15 -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 6: Click on label Green -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 8: Fill out shipping address form and complete order

column2: - Step 3: Enter input value in input Email
- Step 4: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
- Step 8: Enter input value in input FirstName
- Step 11: Enter input value in input LastName
- Step 14: Enter input value in input Address
- Step 17: Enter input value in input ZipCode
- Step 20: Enter input value in input ShippingCity
- Step 23: Enter input value in input State
- Step 25: Enter input value in input Phone
- Step 26: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'

column1: Step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
